## About this guide  

### Who is this guide for?  

This guide is aimed at users who are familiar with R and RStudio, but new to CDAP and creating shiny apps.  


### What is this guide for?  

This user guide shows how to create and publish Shiny apps on CDAP.

## Creating a Shiny app on CDAP

We will create a simple Shiny app so you learn the ropes of doing this. There is lots of documentation on making more complicated apps on the [RStudio Shiny pages](https://shiny.rstudio.com/).

Start by installing and loading the package:

```{r }
install.packages("shiny")
library(shiny)
```
